title: Tensions escalate after Syria downs Israeli plane
text:
Tensions escalate after Syria downs Israeli plane 9:32pm IST - 00:53 
Israel has attacked targets in Syria after an Israeli war plane was shot down on Saturday by Syrian anti-aircraft fire. Israeli military said its jet had been on a mission to strike an Iranian target after Iran launched a drone from Syria into Israeli airspace. Anna Bevan reports   
Israel has attacked targets in Syria after an Israeli war plane was shot down on Saturday by Syrian anti-aircraft fire.
